    findImpacts()
    if player impacts the ball, the ball direction is reversed vertically if ball impacts the brick, score is increased, brick count is decreased if ball impacts the 2 horizontal borders of wall, ball direction is reversed vertically if ball impacts the 2 vertical borders of wall, ball direction is reversed horizontally if y coordinates of ball is more than the area's y coordinates , ballcount is decreased, ball is reset to initial position

  • Constructor Details

    • Wall

      public Wall(Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio, Point ballPos)
      Parameters:
      drawArea - area of the entire wall
      brickCount - number of bricks
      lineCount - number of lines to be filled with bricks
      brickDimensionRatio -
      ballPos - position of the ball

  • Method Details

    • makeSingleTypeLevel

      public BrickController[] makeSingleTypeLevel(Rectangle drawArea, int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio, int type)
      Parameters:
      drawArea - the area
      brickCnt - total number of bricks in the wall
      lineCnt - lines of bricks on the wall
      brickSizeRatio - the ratio of the length to height of the brick
      type - type of brick
      Returns:
      a list of only clay bricks ( the wall )

    • move

      public void move()
      consists of the movements of both player rectangle and ball

    • findImpacts

      public void findImpacts()
      if player impacts the ball, the ball direction is reversed vertically if ball impacts the brick, score is increased, brick count is decreased if ball impacts the 2 horizontal borders of wall, ball direction is reversed vertically if ball impacts the 2 vertical borders of wall, ball direction is reversed horizontally if y coordinates of ball is more than the area's y coordinates , ballcount is decreased, ball is reset to initial position

    • getBrickCount

      public int getBrickCount()

    • getBallCount

      public boolean isBallLost()
      Returns:
      check if the ball is lost within the frame

      reset the ball to first position

    • wallReset

      public void wallReset()
      reset the entire wall ( giving 3 ball chances and original brick layout)

    • isLifeCollected

      public boolean isLifeCollected()
      Returns:
      true if the extra life power is collected

    • isSpeedCollected

      public boolean isSpeedCollected()

    • touchIcon

      public void touchIcon(Point2D p)
      Parameters:
      p - the position of the extra life power up if ball touches the extra life power up, ball count is incremented, and a winning image is displayed

    • touchSpeedIcon

      public void touchSpeedIcon(Point2D p)
      Parameters:
      p - position of the speed icon power up if ball position in bounds of speed icon position the speed icon will not be activated after it has been touched once by the ball

    • ballEnd

      public boolean ballEnd()
      Returns:
      true if there are no more ball lives left

    • isDone

      public boolean isDone()
      Returns:
      if the level is passed (if all the bricks are broken)
